name: Tomb Raider
overview:
In the Tomb Raider Arcade game, Lara Croft moves from the gaming console to a giant 120” arcade game. Tomb Raider Arcade is an intense 4-Player game where players test their skills through 3 chapters with 5 sections each. Based on the character from the hugely success console game and movie franchise.

Team up with other players and battle against increasingly difficult waves of enemies and push your limits to the very edge!
